definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, abbr. to 中共中央[Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會

definition: Propaganda Department of the Communist Party of China
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 dang3 Zhong1 yang1 Wei3 yuan2 hui4 Xuan1 chuan2 bu4
containing_words.word: 中國共產黨中央委員會宣傳部

sentences.english: Indirect elections take place at the city level and above. We have multi-candidate elections for members of the CPC Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中央委員會的選舉當中實行了差額選舉。

sentences.english: We should coopt him onto the Central Committee.
sentences.chinese: 我們應把他增選進中央委員會。

sentences.english: Members and alternate members of the Central Committee must have a Party standing of five years or more.
sentences.chinese: 中央委員會委員和候補委員必須有五年以上的黨齡。

sentences.english: Moreover, we have the multi-candidate elections for members of central committees in the central authorities.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中央委員會的選舉當中實行了差額選舉。

sentences.english: His view discords with the principles of the central committee.
sentences.chinese: 他的觀點與中央委員會的原則不符合。

sentences.english: His Politburo and Central Committee comrades had no real stomach for reform.
sentences.chinese: 蘇聯政治局和中央委員會也沒有真正的能力應對改革。

sentences.english: Our Central Committee member went to meet the AP Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 我們的中央委員會委員去見安得拉邦的部長。

sentences.english: A central committee can provide guidelines and standards to different teams.
sentences.chinese: 中央委員會可以爲不同的團隊提供指導方針和規範。

definition: Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
Communist International or Comintern (1919-1943), also known as the Third International 第三國際|第三国际[Di4 san1 Guo2 ji4]
François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017
He Houhua (1955-), Macau financier and politician, first magistrate from 1999
